name: Global Conference on Pediatrics and Neonatology
content: Global Conference on Pediatrics and Neonatology (GCPN 2024) is focused on providing the latest advances in pediatric research, Neonatology and evidence-based practice to improve the quality of childrenâ€™s health care. This annual learning event emphasizes practical application of current concepts that pediatricians, pediatric specialists, family physicians and advanced practice providers involved in the care of children and adolescents can apply in their practice. Visit: https://pediatrics.lambdaconferences.com/ Our goal is to bring together many of our investigators from our Department to present their progress made in various areas of research. Speakers represent many disciplines using a broad-spectrum of translational research and methodologies in each area. The scientific program can be viewed as a series of parallel speciality conferences that cover the latest hot topics and developments across specialities of pediatrics. Main theme of the conference is "Innovations in Pediatric Healthcare: Shaping Bright Futures". Join us in London for a unique education experience in one of the most fascinating cities in the world.
